content.question: A horizontal electron beam in an oscilloscope is aimed at the center of the display screen, as shown in the diagram above. A C-shaped magnet is placed around the oscilloscope, producing a vertical magnetic field B, which is perpendicular to the beam. Which way, if any, will the beam be deflected by the magnetic field?

choices.label: The beam will not be deflected.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
